item.title: How to collect all npm licenses from multiple subdirectories with Powershell
item.description: Install license-report (https://www.npmjs.com/package/license-report) npm install -g license-report run the script Get-ChildItem -Directory | foreach { $_ >> ./licenses.csv ; license-report --output=csv --only=prod --package=./$_/package.json >> ./licenses.csv } You can use the same idea to run other stuff in subdirectories. Just replace the command. Here is an example of git pull. Get-ChildItem -Directory -Force -Recurse *.git | ForEach-Object { cd $_.Parent.FullName; Write-Host $_.Parent.FullName; git pull }
